name: cbig_gpan_global2000
title: Zonation results data for global analysis for year 2000.
description: Datapackage (1 out of 4) for the publication 'Global protected area expansion is compromised by projected land-use and parochialism'. NEEDS TO BE EXTENDED.

resources._comment: IN 1.0-alpha DATA IS NOT FORMATTED PROPERLY

fields.name: prop_lost
fields.title: Proportion of landscape lost
fields.description: The proportion of the landscape removed.

fields.name: ave_prop_rem
fields.title: Average proportion remaining
fields.description: The average proportion over all species.

fields.name: ave_prop_rem_amphibians
fields.title: Average proportion remaining for amphibians
fields.description: The average proportion over amphibian species.

fields.name: ave_prop_rem_birds
fields.title: Average proportion remaining for birds
fields.description: The average proportion over bird species.

fields.name: ave_prop_rem_mammals
fields.title: Average proportion remaining for mammals
fields.description: The average proportion over mammal species.

fields.name: ave_prop_rem_reptiles
fields.title: Average proportion remaining for reptiles
fields.description: The average proportion over reptile species.

fields.name: ave_prop_rem_lc
fields.title: Average proportion remaining for LC species
fields.description: The average proportion over all species with IUCN category LC.

fields.name: ave_prop_rem_nt
fields.title: Average proportion remaining for NT species
fields.description: The average proportion over all species with IUCN category NT.

fields.name: ave_prop_rem_vu
fields.title: Average proportion remaining for VU species
fields.description: The average proportion over all species with IUCN category VU.

fields.name: ave_prop_rem_en
fields.title: Average proportion remaining for EN species
fields.description: The average proportion over all species with IUCN category EN.

fields.title: Average proportion remaining for CR species
fields.description: The average proportion over all species with IUCN category CR.
